title: Calories in 6 Piece Chicken McNuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in 6 piece chicken mcnuggets, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: McDonald's-style Chicken McNuggets, breaded, fried in vegetable oil, standard size (~17 g each), no dipping sauce included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, portion size, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Six piece chicken McNuggets provide ~250 kcal and ~14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken McNugget?
faqs.a: About 42 kcal per piece, based on standard serving.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 6 piece chicken mcnuggets?
faqs.a: Approximately 14 g of protein for the 6-piece serving.

faqs.q: Are chicken McNuggets high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 pieces contain ~580 mg sodium, about 25% of daily value.

faqs.q: Do chicken mcnuggets have trans fat?
faqs.a: Minimal, around 0 g total in 6 pieces under current recipes.

faqs.q: How do sauces affect calories in 6 piece chicken mcnuggets?
